question:
Recently, the Union Cabinet has approved for creation of "Madhyamik and Uchchtar Shiksha Kosh" (MUSK). With this reference, consider the following statements:
  1. The proposed MUSK will be maintained as a Reserve Fund in Public Accounts of India.
  2. It will be a non-lapsable fund and will be used to boost secondary and higher education in the country
  3. Ministry of Human Resources and Development (MoHRD) will be the nodal agency for the administration and maintenance of the MUSK
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The Union Cabinet chaired by the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi has recently approved for the creation of a non-lapsable pool known as \"Madhyamik and Uchchtar Shiksha Kosh\" (MUSK). All proceeds of \"Secondary and Higher Education Cess\" will be credited to the fund and the fund will be used ongoing schemes of Secondary and Higher Education. However, the Ministry of Human Resources Development can allocate funds for any future programme/scheme of secondary and higher education, based on the requirement, as per prescribed procedure laid down.
